skills.title: Figma
skills.description: As a skilled Figma user, I design intuitive and visually appealing interfaces. My expertise includes high-fidelity prototypes, wireframes, and user-centered designs. I excel in Figma's collaborative features, enabling seamless teamwork through real-time sharing and feedback

skills.title: Adobe Xd
skills.description: I am proficient in Adobe XD, utilizing its robust features to design and prototype interactive user interfaces and experiences. My expertise includes creating wireframes, high-fidelity mockups, and fully interactive prototypes that capture the user journey from start to finish

skills.title: Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator
skills.description: In Photoshop, I excel in photo editing, retouching, and digital arts. My skills in Illustrator include vector graphics, logos, and typography. I give strong attention to detail and high-quality visuals that meet client needs and design standards

skills.title: Adobe premiere Pro and After Effects
skills.description: I have skills in Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects, where I create and edit video content with basic transitions, effects, and animations. In Premiere Pro, I handle video cuts, color correction, and audio syncing. In After Effects, I work on simple motion graphics and visual effects
